revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=VEVG2500 |revision=-1NCGES (Numericable) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=06/2012 |type=wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 80910;XWAY VRX268; |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |ram1_brand=Nanya |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL (internal) |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=VDSL2 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NUMERICABLE-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^NUMERICABLE-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:8E:F2 |oui_eth=00:8E:F2 }} ''Modem Routeur Wi-Fi XDSL''
[http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/VEVG2500_EN-FR-IT_DoC_18jun12.pdf Declaration of Conformity] (dated 2012-06-11)
[http://tools.netgear.com/environmental/NTGR%20CoC%20VEVG2500%20R1.pdf Certificate of Compliance] (dated 2012-06-19) :The product name is states as '''VDSL 11N INTEGRATED ACCESS DEVICE (V1H1>)'''. [http://kb.netgear.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/2649/~/open-source-code-for-programmers-%28gpl%29 This device has GPL code available on '''NETGEAR''''s site]. :[ftp://downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/ On the '''NETGEAR''' FTP server] ::This is apparently a '''Westell''' router.. [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/vevg2500 On the '''OpenWrt Wiki''']
[http://www.netgear-forum.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=74476 On '''NETGEAR-Forum.com''' (FR)] :192.168.0.1 IP, 00:8E:F2 OUI This device is (or was) used by '''{{Used by service|Numericable}}''' - a French ISP. :[http://assistance.numericable.fr/IMG/pdf/guide_d_installation_netgear_adsl.pdf Installation guide] ::[http://assistance.numericable.fr/Presentation-modem-NETGEAR-XDSL-ADSL.html .. and some of the same in HTML]
